comment.author: 92564713@N05
comment._content: I think the bridge is the one at Murray Bridge, South Australia, which is situated adjacent to the Round House.

comment.author: 84391481@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/92564713@N05] Correct it is at Murray Bridge.  Bridge built in 1879 as the first road bridge across the Murray.
